Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent

Class SelectServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.SelectServiceFluent<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion
public class SelectServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> extends Object implements io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion
Fluent service class for interacting with select dropdown components.

Provides methods for selecting, validating, and retrieving options from dropdown elements.

The generic type T represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends UiServiceFluent, enabling method chaining for seamless interaction.

Author:

    • validateAvailableOptions

      public T validateAvailableOptions(SelectUiElement element, boolean soft, String... expectedValues)
      Validates that the available options in the specified select element match the expected values.
      Parameters:
      element - The SelectUiElement representing the dropdown.
      soft - A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly. If true, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
      expectedValues - The expected option values.
      Returns:
      The fluent UI service instance.
